solution_line_template: She paints {twice_amount} x {monday_paint} square feet on Tuesday = <<{twice_amount}*{monday_paint}={tuesday_paint}>>{tuesday_paint} square feet of wall.

On Wednesday Elisa paints 1/{half_amount_divisor} as many square feet as she painted on Monday, 1/{half_amount_divisor} x {monday_paint} square feet = <<1/{half_amount_divisor}*{monday_paint}={wednesday_paint}>>{wednesday_paint} square feet of wall.
In total, Elisa paints {monday_paint} + {tuesday_paint} + {wednesday_paint} = <<{monday_paint}+{tuesday_paint}+{wednesday_paint}={total_paint}>>{total_paint} square feet of wall.
